Package coolGame.model.character

Class Player

java.lang.Object
coolGame.model.character.Character
coolGame.model.character.Player
public class Player
extends Character
Model that constructs a single player in the game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean blockEnemy​(Enemy enemy)
    Returns whether the player has blocked the enemy's attack and gains additional mana
    void coldAttack​(Enemy enemy)
    Cold spell method that calculates the damage dealt by the enemy; Every third cold spell freezes enemy
    void displayInventory()
    Displays the player's inventory of items with their name, stats, and description
    void fireAttack​(Enemy enemy)
    Fire spell method that calculates the damage dealt by the enemy; Every second fire spell does bonus fire damage
    int getDebuffTurnCounter()
    Returns the amount of turns with debuff
    boolean getHasLightningDebuff()
    Returns whether the player has lightning debuff on/off
    int getHitsTakenCounter()
    Returns number of hits taken
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> getInventory()
    Returns an arraylist of the player's inventory
    ItemStorage getItem()
    Returns an item from ItemStorage
    int getOriginalDmg()
    Returns the original damage
    int getSpecialAttack()
    Returns the number of special attacks
    int getSpellCounter()
    Returns number of spell used
    int getTurnCounter()
    Returns the number of turns
    void increaseMana​(int num)
    Player's mana increases each time they attack
    boolean isShieldEffect()
    Returns whether the player's shield is in effect or not
    void lightningAttack​(Enemy enemy)
    Lightning spell method that calculates the damage dealt by the enemy; Damages enemy and applies lightning debuff that does additional damage to enemy every turn
    void physicalAttack​(Enemy enemy)
    Physical attack method that calculates the damage dealt by the enemy; Every fourth physical attack does a special physical attack
    void poisonAttack​(Enemy enemy)
    Poison spell method that calculates the damage dealt by the enemy; Once used, a debuff on the enemy is applied in which the enemy loses an additional 10 HP every round
    int randomInt​(int min, int max)
    Returns a random number from a minimum and maximum value
    int randomizeDmg​(java.lang.String dmgType)
    Randomizes the player's damage based off of the attack they choose
    void resetBlock()
    Resets block as false when attacking
    void resetCounters()
    Resets all counters for attacks, spells, damages, etc.
    void resetDebuff()
    Removes debuffs from enemy
    void setDebuffCounter​(int debuffCounter)
    Sets the debuff counter
    void setDebuffOn​(boolean debuffOn)
    Sets whether debuff is on/off
    void setHasLightningDebuff​(boolean hasLightningDebuff)
    Sets the lightning debuff
    void setHitsTakenCounter​(int hitsTakenCounter)
    Sets the number of hits taken

    Sets the item of ItemStorage
    void setShieldEffect​(boolean shieldEffect)
    Sets the shield effect of the player
    void startOfTurn​(Player player)  
    void updateInventory​(Player player)
    Updates inventory with an obtained item
    void useSpell()
    Decreases the player's mana by 5 when using spell
